title: Routine harvest challenges
text: Routine harvest challenges. I check the crops to see if the plants are healthy. Farm safety rules are part of our routine. I feed the cows and make sure they have clean water. We record yields and monitor feed intake. I work on Green Valley Farm, and every day is busy. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. I clean the barn after milking and store the tools. In the morning, I wake up early and walk to the fields. In Canadian winter, we protect equipment from freezing. The sun is low, and the soil is cool and soft.
